definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Speculators, betting that the yuan will appreciate, are buying it with weakening greenbacks.
sentences.chinese: 打賭人民幣升值的投機者用疲軟的美元購買人民幣。

sentences.english: Speculators eager to earn a fast buck often wind up in bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 急於想發橫財的投機者到頭來往往破產。

sentences.english: Speculators Õ too believe Treasury yields will rise in the near term.
sentences.chinese: 投機者也相信短期美國國債收益率將會上升。

sentences.english: Fast-money traders are selling as they are stopped out of short-term positions.
sentences.chinese: 投機者在拋售，是因爲他們正從短期頭寸脫身。
他們將被稱爲投機者和姦商。

sentences.english: Market participants do not wear badges that identify them as investors or speculators.
sentences.chinese: 市場參與者不戴胸卡，表明他們是投資者或投機者。

sentences.english: Hope and fear are the two greatest enemies of speculators.
sentences.chinese: 期冀和恐懼是投機者兩個最大的敵人。

sentences.english: Losses make the speculator studious——not profits.
sentences.chinese: 賠錢不能贏利，但能使投機者細心鑽研。

sentences.english: Line speculators, how to influence the market price of real estate?
sentences.chinese: 管不住線投機者，如何影響市場價格的房地產？

sentences.english: The speculator specifically specified the specification of this species
sentences.chinese: 投機者特地指定了這種物種標本的規範。

sentences.english: An experience I had as an Opportunist was during college.
sentences.chinese: 我在大學的時候也有一段投機者的經歷。

sentences.english: CDS speculators do not have the power to push countries towards default.
sentences.chinese: 把相關國家推向違約，CDS投機者可沒這個本事。

sentences.english: In certain circumstances speculators are capable of creating self-fulfilling prophecies.//
sentences.chinese: 在某些情況下，投機者能夠創造出自我實現的預言。

sentences.english: The speculator specificnumjust ber one ingly specified the specific of this species specimen.
sentences.chinese: 投機者特地指定了這種物種標本的表率。

sentences.english: Hope and fear are the two greatest enemies of eculators.
sentences.chinese: 期冀和懼怕是投機者兩個最大的敵人。

sentences.english: When speculators confuse the market, none will make money.
sentences.chinese: 投機者把市場搞亂了，誰也賺不了錢。

definition: to invest in stock/to buy shares
hot money, money flowing from one currency to another in the hope of quick profit
